round_best: Develop a hierarchical text-to-image diffusion model that uses a two-tiered approach to address customization and diversity. The first tier would interpret the text description and reference images to extract and synthesize key visual attributes (like color schemes, textures, or specific style elements). The second tier would then use this synthesized attribute palette to guide the diffusion process, ensuring that each generated image not only aligns with the abstract concepts or categories described in the text but also retains variation in visual representation, leading to both high personalization and diversity in output.
